short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays Formula 1 driver and constructor standings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a side-project made by Sampreet Klair, which shows the current Formula 1 Driver and Constructor Standing in form of a Chrome Extension. I have used the ergast.com API to create this extension.
